## Annotated Sample (n = 20)

A fresh random sample (seed = 99) drawn from the 70,655 Phase 2 rows, annotated by **DeepSeek v3.2-speciale** (temperature 0.3, reasoning effort = medium). This sample has not been seen during prompt development --- it is a blind test of annotation quality.

::: {.callout-tip}
## Interactive Table
Use the search box to filter rows, click column headers to sort, and use pagination to browse. All 20 rows are shown with key annotation columns.
:::

```{python}
#| label: pi-review-table
#| echo: false
import pandas as pd
from itables import show

df = pd.read_csv("../reports/phase3/phase3_pi_review_results.csv")

# Select key columns for the review table
display_cols = [
    "Utterance",
    "Determiner/Numbers",
    "Classifier",
    "Speaker_Role",
    "age_years",
    "determiner_type",
    "identified_noun",
    "conventional_classifier_zh",
    "classifier_type",
    "overuse_of_ge",
    "rationale",
]

df_display = df[display_cols].copy()
df_display.columns = [
    "Utterance",
    "Det/Num",
    "CL",
    "Speaker",
    "Age (yr)",
    "Det Type",
    "Noun",
    "Conv. CL",
    "CL Type",
    "Overuse?",
    "Rationale",
]

show(
    df_display,
    paging=True,
    pageLength=10,
    searching=True,
    ordering=True,
    scrollX=True,
    columnDefs=[
        {"width": "250px", "targets": [0]},
        {"width": "200px", "targets": [10]},
    ],
    classes="display compact",
)
```

## Sample Summary

```{python}
#| label: sample-summary
#| echo: false
n = len(df)
n_overuse = df["overuse_of_ge"].sum()
n_omitted = (df["identified_noun"] == "OMITTED").sum()
n_specific = (df["classifier_type"] == "Specific").sum()
n_general = (df["classifier_type"] == "General").sum()
n_child = (df["Speaker_Role"] == "Target_Child").sum()
n_adult = n - n_child - (df["Speaker_Role"] == "Child").sum()
```

## Column Reference

| Column | Source | Description |
|--------|--------|-------------|
| `File Name` | Phase 2 (SQL) | CHILDES corpus file path |
| `Speaker_Code` | Phase 2 (SQL) | Speaker code from CHILDES (CHI, MOT, FAT, etc.) |
| `Speaker_Role` | Phase 2 (SQL) | Speaker role (Target_Child, Mother, Father, etc.) |
| `Age` | Phase 2 (SQL) | Target child age in days |
| `age_years` | Computed | Age in decimal years (age_days / 365.25) |
| `age_available` | Computed | Whether age metadata exists |
| `Utterance` | Phase 2 (SQL) | Full utterance from CHILDES |
| `%gra` | Phase 2 (SQL) | POS tag sequence for the utterance |
| `Determiner/Numbers` | Phase 2 (SQL) | The numeral/determiner/demonstrative preceding the classifier |
| `Classifier` | Phase 2 (SQL) | The classifier token |
| `determiner_type` | Computed | Semantic type: demonstrative, numeral, interrogative, ordinal, quantifier |
| `identified_noun` | LLM (Phase 3) | The noun modified by the classifier, or OMITTED |
| `conventional_classifier` | LLM (Phase 3) | Standard adult classifier for this noun (pinyin) |
| `conventional_classifier_zh` | LLM (Phase 3) | Standard adult classifier (Simplified Chinese) |
| `classifier_type` | LLM (Phase 3) | General (个) or Specific |
| `overuse_of_ge` | LLM (Phase 3) | True if 个 was used where a specific classifier is conventional |
| `rationale` | LLM (Phase 3) | One-sentence explanation of the judgment |
| `utterance_id` | Phase 2 (SQL) | Unique utterance ID from childes-db (pending re-extraction) |
| `utterance_order` | Phase 2 (SQL) | Position of utterance within transcript (pending re-extraction) |
| `classifier_token_order` | Phase 2 (SQL) | Token position of classifier in utterance (pending re-extraction) |
| `transcript_id` | Phase 2 (SQL) | Unique transcript ID from childes-db (pending re-extraction) |
